tossup_question: -   –   Which of the following best describes the kinetics of radioactive decay?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W)It is a zeroth order process
X)It is a first order process
Y)It is a second order process
Z)It is a third order process
tossup_answer: ANSWER: X) IT IS A FIRST ORDER PROCESS
bonus_question: -   –  Rank the following four atoms from the smallest atomic radius to the largest atomic radius: 1) Oxygen; 2) Fluorine; 3) Sulfur; 4) Chlorine.
